thread.title: BREAKING: Fire crews rush to New York airport after 'plane erupts in FLAMES on JFK runway'
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Fire crews rush to New York airport after 'plane erupts in FLAMES on JFK runway'

title: BREAKING: Fire crews rush to New York airport after 'plane erupts in FLAMES on JFK runway'
text:
BREAKING: Fire crews rush to New York airport after 'plane erupts in FLAMES on JFK runway' BREAKING: Fire crews rush to New York airport after 'plane erupts in FLAMES on JFK runway' AN INFERNO has reportedly engulfed a plane at a bustling American international airport, forcing the runway into a complete standstill. PUBLISHED: 05:23, Fri, Feb 10, 2017 | UPDATED: 05:33, Fri, Feb 10, 2017 Twitter Plane in flames at JFK airport 
Reports confirm fire crews quickly scrambled to John F Kennedy's airport in New York in a bid to tame the impeding fire. 
It is not yet known how many passengers, if any, were on board the plane. 
More to follow...
